ctx: intros H' a d H'0; elim H'0; auto.
exceptions.tactic: intros a0 H'1; red in |- *; exists (Opp a0); auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment S : Set A : S -> Prop Add, Mult : S -> S -> S O, I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat H' : is_ring a, d : S H'0 : divide d a a0 : A d H'1 : A a /\\ (a = O \\/ d <> O /\\ (exists q : S, A q /\\ a = Mult d q)) The term "a0" has type "A d" while it is expected to have type "S".

original: intros H' a d H'0; elim H'0; auto. intros a0 H'1; red in |- *; exists (Opp a0); auto. apply Trans with (a0 R_O); auto.
